alert.note: Alert for Baker; Colquitt; Decatur; Dougherty; Grady; Lee; Miller; Mitchell; Seminole; Thomas; Tift; Turner; Worth (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Tornado Watch issued December 10 at 8:18AM EST until December 10 at 11:00AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: THE NATIONAL WEATHER SERVICE HAS EXTENDED TORNADO WATCH 719 TO INCLUDE THE FOLLOWING AREAS UNTIL 11 AM EST THIS MORNING IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 6 COUNTIES IN BIG BEND FLORIDA FRANKLIN GADSDEN JEFFERSON LEON LIBERTY WAKULLA IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 13 COUNTIES IN SOUTH CENTRAL GEORGIA COLQUITT THOMAS TIFT TURNER WORTH IN SOUTHWEST GEORGIA BAKER DECATUR DOUGHERTY GRADY LEE MILLER MITCHELL SEMINOLE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF ALBANY, ALFORDS, ALMA, APALACHICOLA, ASHBURN, AUSMAC, BABCOCK, BAINBRIDGE, BAY CITY, BEACHTON, BELLVIEW, BETHEL, BEVERLY, BOYKIN, BRADFORDVILLE, BRANCHVILLE, BUCK SIDING, CAIRO, CAMILLA, CAPEL, CAPITOLA, CAPPS, CARRABELLE, CASA BLANCO, CHAIRES, CHAIRES CROSSROADS, CHATTAHOOCHEE, CHULA, COLQUITT, COOKTOWN, COTTON, DAVIS PARK, DECATUR CO A/P, DILLON, DILLS, DONALDSONVILLE A/P, DONALSONVILLE, DRIFTON, EAST ALBANY, ELMODEL WMA, ELPINO, ENTERPRISE, FAIRCHILD, FESTUS, FORRESTER, FORT GADSDEN, GAMMAGE, GORDY, GRADY CO A/P, HANOVER, HARDIN HEIGHTS, HARDING, HAWKINSTOWN, HILLIARDVILLE, HOBBY, HOGGARD MILL, ISABELLA, IVEYS MILL, JARROTT, KILLEARN ESTATES, KILLEARN LAKES, LEESBURG, LITTLE HOPE, LITTMAN, LOCKETT CROSSING, LYNN, MACLAY STATE GARDENS, MAYHAW, METCALF, MILFORD, MITCHELL CO A/P, MONCRIEF, MONTICELLO, MOULTRIE, MOULTRIE MUNICIPAL A/P, NEWTON, PALMYRA, PASCO, PELHAM, PINE PARK, PRETORIA, QUINCY, QUINCY AIRPORT, RED ROCK, RED STORE CROSSROADS, RIVERTURN, SANTA CLARA, SEMINOLE STATE PARK, SMITHVILLE, SOPCHOPPY, SOUTHWEST GA REGIONAL A/P, SPENCE AIRPORT, ST. MARKS, STEINHAM STORE, SUNSWEET, SWEETWATER, SYLVESTER, SYLVESTER AIRPORT, TALLAHASSEE, THOMASVILLE, TIFTON, TILTON, TURNER CITY, WAKULLA SPRINGS, WALKER, WEST BAINBRIDGE, WETUMPKA, AND WORTH.
